thread.section_title: LendingTree Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LendingTree | www.lendingtree.com | 5 of 243
thread.title: Eugene D.

author: Eugene D.
title: Eugene D.
text:
I'm transitioning careers in life and I needed a loan to help. I was nervous about how I'd be able to survive and have held off. LendingTree gave me an option. Yes, the interest is high, but it gave me an option. That's all I needed.
I wrote this review because I was skeptical, but I tried it and I got the money I needed. I appreciated their great service so I'm telling it like it is.
